Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authority of the village of Highland Falls to impose an occupancy tax
Summary: Extends the authority of the village of Highland Falls to impose an occupancy tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 459 of the laws of 2022, amending the tax law relating to authorizing an occupancy tax in the village of Highland Falls, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
